ow.messaging.udp
クラス UDPMessagingProvider

java.lang.Object
  ow.messaging.AbstractMessagingProvider
      ow.messaging.udp.UDPMessagingProvider
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
MessagingProvider
public class UDPMessagingProvider
extends AbstractMessagingProvider

A messaging provider which uses UDP as the transport protocol. Call MessagingFactory#getProvider() to obtain a provider.

コンストラクタの概要
UDPMessagingProvider()
           
 
メソッドの概要
 MessagingConfiguration getDefaultConfiguration()
          Returns the default configuration.
 InetMessagingAddress getMessagingAddress(int port)
          Returns a MessagingAddress for the caller itself with the given port number.
 InetMessagingAddress getMessagingAddress(java.lang.String hostAndPort)
          Returns a MessagingAddress with the given hostname and port number in the following format: hostname:port or hostname/port.
 InetMessagingAddress getMessagingAddress(java.lang.String hostname, int port)
          Returns a MessagingAddress with the given hostname and port number.
 MessagingAddress getMessagingCollectorAddress()
          Returns the address to which all sent messages are reported.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Returns the name of the provider.
 MessageReceiver getReceiver(MessagingConfiguration config, int port)
          Returns a MessageReceiver bound to the port numbered 'port'.
 MessageReceiver getReceiver(MessagingConfiguration config, int port, int portRange)
          Returns a MessageReceiver bound to one of port numbers from port to port+portRange-1.
 TimeoutCalculator getTimeoutCalculator()

          Returns true if the transport which this messaging service uses is reliable.
 MessagingAddress setMessagingCollectorAddress(MessagingAddress addr)
          Sets an address to which all sent messages are reported.
 void setSelfAddress(java.lang.String host)
          A workaround to set the hostname or IP address of this node itself.
 MessagingProvider substitute()
          A workaround for Emulator.

メソッドの詳細

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
インタフェース MessagingProvider の記述:
Returns the name of the provider.

isReliable

public boolean isReliable()
インタフェース MessagingProvider の記述:
Returns true if the transport which this messaging service uses is reliable. For example, TCP and Emulator messaging services return true, and UDP messaging service returns false.

getDefaultConfiguration

public MessagingConfiguration getDefaultConfiguration()
インタフェース MessagingProvider の記述:
Returns the default configuration.
